data.name: Shooty Skies 358/2 Days Chain of Memories II coded - Final Mix Pack
data.detailed_description:
Boost your pilot collection with this set of pilots, plus added extras for FREE!

Please note: if you already own a pilot from this set, you will be rewarded with a duplicate consolation prize. So feel free to use this pack to fill out any holes in your pilot lineup!

This DLC Pack contains:

  • This pack includes EVERY SINGLE standard pilot available in-game! WHOA!
  • 5000 Coins
  • 10000 Gold Tickets
  • Sir Oinks-A-Lot (permanently doubles coins dropped in-game)
  • Gold Piggy (permanently doubles Gold Tickets dropped in-game)
  • Includes new pilots every update! ZOMG

data.short_description: This pack includes EVERY SINGLE standard pilot available in-game! WHOA! Includes new pilots every update!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 +
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
